data <- read_csv(here::here("data/usa_00001.csv"))
reduced_data <- data %>%
  select("STATEICP", "EDUCD")
reduced_tibble <- as.tibble(reduced_data)
print(reduced_tibble)

  count(STATEICP)

# View the result
